author: viktormux
title: DLT & AI for Transport & Logistics
description: Recurrent avoidable Inneficiencies in Transport and Logistic operations causing delays, extra costs and polluting emissions.
solution: DLT and AI combined are meant to dramatically improve logistic & transport operational processes.
experience: Operating since 2005 at CargoNetwork, a trusted Transport & Logistic solutions company providing solutions in the european market.
